alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tooele County through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delle, or 22 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delle. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 57 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
